metadata.lecture_topic: В спам-примере, вычисли P(win|спам) с Laplace.

turns.content: В спам-примере, вычисли P(win|спам) с Laplace.

turns.model_response:
P(win | spam) is calculated using Laplace's rule of succession, which estimates probabilities by adding pseudocounts for each possible outcome. Given S wins out of T spages, the formula becomes:

\[ P(\text{win} | \text{spam}) = \frac{S + 1}{T + 2} \]

This approach ensures that no single outcome is favored without data, providing a neutral starting point for probability estimation.
